headline: Republic Services price target raised to $280 from $268 at BMO Capital
summary: BMO Capital raised the firm’s price target on Republic Services (RSG) to $280 from $268 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm hosted the company’s management team last week, and the discussion reinforced its positive view on the shares and highlighted the runway for growth and margin expansion opportunities in the business, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Republic Services is performing well and there is good visibility into strong margin improvement in 2025, BMO

headline: 2 Unpopular Stocks that Deserve Some Love and 1 to Avoid
summary: When Wall Street turns bearish on a stock, it’s worth paying attention. These calls stand out because analysts rarely issue grim ratings on companies for fear their firms will lose out in other business lines such as M&A advisory.
